Ao segmentar sua programação para um público mais exigente, a 104 FM sabia que estava enfrentando o desafio da qualidade. E o tempo mostrou que o caminho escolhido estava correto, pois, hoje, é uma das rádios com maior audiência na Grande Natal. Title: Arcanos Web Radio
Description: Rock radio from São Paulo ARCANOS MOTO CLUB was created from the yearnings and ideas of companions who believe in the philosophy: Motorcycle, Freedom, Fellowship, Rock and Roll and Tradition. They are these concepts that determine the direction and objectives of the MC. Significant events and participation in other mc's have made us seek the realization of a motorcycle club that maintains in its essence the idealism, the companionship, the friendship, the taste for the same type of music, the spirit of adventure and above all the respect between its ARCANOS MOTO CLUBE, whose meaning goes back in its name: "WHAT IS HIDDEN UNDER THE SYMBOL". This symbol represented by PENTAGRAMA, which with its five points translates our philosophy, giving rise to the following correspondence: Tip 1 - Motorcycle, Tip 2 - Freedom, Tip 3 - Fellowship, Tip 4 - Rock and Roll, Tip 5 - Tradition.
